questions.question: What is your company name?
questions.description: Provides context for the persona's purchasing environment

questions.question: What is the name of this buyer persona?
questions.description: Used throughout the document to reference this specific persona
questions.placeholder: e.g., 'IT Director Daniel' or 'Marketing Manager Maya'

questions.question: What product or solution does this persona evaluate or purchase?
questions.description: Links the persona to the specific offering they influence or buy

questions.question: When does this persona documentation become effective?
questions.description: Indicates when the persona insights should be used

questions.question: When was this persona last reviewed or updated?
questions.description: Helps ensure persona remains current and accurate

questions.question: Who approved this persona documentation?
questions.description: Shows ownership and sign-off for the persona

questions.question: What is the version number for this persona document?
questions.description: Tracks document revisions and updates

questions.question: What is the persona's job title?
questions.description: Primary identifier for the persona's organizational role

questions.question: Which department does this persona work in?
questions.description: Clarifies the functional area and priorities

questions.question: What is the persona's seniority level?
questions.description: Determines decision-making authority and focus

questions.question: What size company does this persona typically work for?
questions.description: Influences buying process complexity and budget

questions.question: What industry does this persona typically work in?
questions.description: Helps tailor messaging to industry-specific needs

questions.question: Who does this persona report to?
questions.description: Shows reporting structure and potential approvers

questions.question: What are the persona's key responsibilities?
questions.description: Identifies areas where your solution can help
questions.placeholder: List 3-5 main responsibilities, one per line

questions.question: What are the persona's primary business goals?
questions.description: Add each goal the persona is measured on

questions.question: Provide a brief narrative describing this persona
questions.description: Humanizes the persona and provides context
questions.placeholder: e.g., 'Sarah is a mid-level marketing manager at a growing B2B SaaS company...'

questions.question: What challenges or pain points does this persona face?
questions.description: List problems your product can help solve

questions.question: Where does this persona go for information during their buying process?
questions.description: Add each channel and how they use it

questions.question: What motivates this persona to buy solutions like yours?
questions.description: Add each driver with a brief explanation

questions.question: What criteria does this persona use to evaluate solutions?
questions.description: List evaluation factors and their relative importance

questions.question: Complete the quick-reference summary for this persona
questions.description: Add key summary points for easy reference
